attributes.action: force banks to repay the debt to the government before handing out bonuses to staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I decided to give £300 to my wife, or a friend, instead of paying my bank loan, the bank would come down on me like a ton of bricks.  The government has lent billions to banks, yet does nothing when they give bonuses to staff instead of paying their debt to the government.
